mapper.sql: FROM STN_ORDER_DLVY a JOIN STN_ORDER b ON b.ORDER_NO = a.ORDER_NO AND b.USE_AT = 'Y' JOIN STN_ORDER_SETLE s ON s.ORDER_SETLE_NO = a.ORDER_SETLE_NO JOIN STN_GOODS g ON g.GOODS_ID = b.GOODS_ID JOIN STN_PRTNR_CMPNY_MAPNG m ON m.PCMAPNG_ID = g.PCMAPNG_ID JOIN STN_PRTNR p ON p.PRTNR_ID = m.PRTNR_ID JOIN STN_CMPNY c ON c.CMPNY_ID = m.CMPNY_ID AND c.USE_AT = 'Y' LEFT JOIN STN_HDRY_CMPNY e ON a.HDRY_ID = e.HDRY_ID AND e.USE_AT = 'Y' LEFT JOIN STN_GOODS_CTGRY sgc ON sgc.GOODS_CTGRY_ID = g.GOODS_CTGRY_ID AND sgc.USE_AT = 'Y' LEFT JOIN STN_GOODS_CTGRY sgc2 ON sgc2.GOODS_CTGRY_ID = sgc.UPPER_GOODS_CTGRY_ID AND sgc2.USE_AT = 'Y' LEFT JOIN STN_GOODS_CTGRY sgc3 ON sgc3.GOODS_CTGRY_ID = sgc2.UPPER_GOODS_CTGRY_ID AND sgc3.USE_AT = 'Y' LEFT JOIN DTC_CMMN_DETAIL_CODE cw ON cw.CODE = a.SBSCRPT_DLVY_WD AND cw.CODE_ID = 'CMS023' LEFT JOIN DTC_CMMN_DETAIL_CODE cs ON cs.CODE = s.SETLE_STTUS_CODE AND cs.CODE_ID = 'CMS026' LEFT JOIN DTC_CMMN_DETAIL_CODE co ON co.CODE = b.ORDER_STTUS_CODE AND co.CODE_ID = 'CMS021' LEFT JOIN DTC_CMMN_DETAIL_CODE cd ON cd.CODE = a.DLVY_STTUS_CODE AND cd.CODE_ID = 'CMS022' LEFT JOIN DTC_CMMN_DETAIL_CODE ce ON ce.CODE = a.REQ_TY_CODE AND ce.CODE_ID = 'CMS027'
mapper.select: SELECT A.ORDER_DLVY_NO , A.ORDER_NO , A.ORDER_SETLE_NO , A.ORDER_KND_CODE , A.SBSCRPT_CYCLE_SE_CODE , A.SBSCRPT_WEEK_CYCLE , A.SBSCRPT_DLVY_WD , A.SBSCRPT_MT_CYCLE , A.SBSCRPT_DLVY_DAY , A.ORDER_ODR , A.ORDER_CO , A.SLE_AMOUNT , A.DLVY_AMOUNT , A.DLVY_USER_NM , A.REQ_TY_CODE , A.TELNO , A.DLVY_ZIP , A.DLVY_ADRES , A.DLVY_ADRES_DETAIL , A.DLVY_MSSAGE , A.DLVY_STTUS_CODE , (SELECT API_ID FROM STN_HDRY_CMPNY WHERE HDRY_ID = A.HDRY_ID) AS HDRY_ID , A.HDRY_DLVY_DE , A.INVC_NO , A.REGIST_PNTTM , B.SETLE_STTUS_CODE AS SEARCH_SETLE_STTUS_CODE FROM STN_ORDER_DLVY A JOIN STN_ORDER_SETLE B ON A.ORDER_SETLE_NO = B.ORDER_SETLE_NO WHERE A.ORDER_NO = #{orderNo} AND A.ORDER_REQ_STTUS_CODE != 'C'

SELECT A.ORDER_DLVY_NO , A.ORDER_NO , A.ORDER_SETLE_NO , A.ORDER_KND_CODE , A.SBSCRPT_CYCLE_SE_CODE , A.SBSCRPT_WEEK_CYCLE , A.SBSCRPT_DLVY_WD , A.SBSCRPT_MT_CYCLE , A.SBSCRPT_DLVY_DAY , A.ORDER_ODR , A.ORDER_CO , A.SLE_AMOUNT , A.DLVY_AMOUNT , A.DLVY_USER_NM , A.TELNO , A.DLVY_ZIP , A.DLVY_ADRES , A.DLVY_ADRES_DETAIL , A.DLVY_MSSAGE , A.DLVY_STTUS_CODE , A.HDRY_ID , A.HDRY_DLVY_DE , A.INVC_NO , A.REGIST_PNTTM FROM STN_ORDER_DLVY A
SELECT MAX(A.ORDER_DLVY_NO) AS ORDER_DLVY_NO FROM STN_ORDER_DLVY A JOIN STN_ORDER_SETLE B ON A.ORDER_SETLE_NO = B.ORDER_SETLE_NO AND B.SETLE_STTUS_CODE = 'S' WHERE ORDER_NO = #{orderNo}

SELECT A.ORDER_NO , D.GOODS_ID , D.GOODS_NM , A.ORDER_ODR , A.DLVY_STTUS_CODE , CODE1.CODE_NM AS DLVY_STTUS_CODE_NM , CASE B.SBSCRPT_CYCLE_SE_CODE WHEN 'WEEK' THEN CODE2.CODE_DC WHEN 'MONTH' THEN CONCAT(B.SBSCRPT_DLVY_DAY, '일') END AS SBSCRPT_DLVY_DAY , CASE B.SBSCRPT_CYCLE_SE_CODE WHEN 'WEEK' THEN CONCAT(B.SBSCRPT_WEEK_CYCLE, '주') WHEN 'MONTH' THEN CONCAT(B.SBSCRPT_MT_CYCLE, '개월') END AS SBSCRPT_CYCLE_SE_CODE_NM , CASE WHEN B.ORDER_KND_CODE = 'SBS' THEN CODE3.CODE_NM ELSE '체험구독' END AS ORDER_KND_CODE_NM , B.ORDER_CO , B.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM , A.REQ_TY_CODE , CODE4.CODE_NM AS REQ_TY_CODE_NM , A.ORDER_REQ_STTUS_CODE , CASE WHEN A.REQ_TY_CODE IN ('C04', 'E05', 'R05') THEN A.LAST_UPDT_PNTTM ELSE NULL END AS LAST_UPDT_PNTTM , CODE5.CODE_NM AS ORDER_STTUS_CODE_NM , (SELECT GOODS_IMAGE_THUMB_PATH FROM STN_GOODS_IMAGE WHERE GOODS_ID = D.GOODS_ID AND GOODS_IMAGE_SE_CODE = 'GNR' LIMIT 1) AS GOODS_IMAGE_THUMB_PATH
ORDER BY A.ORDER_DLVY_NO DESC LIMIT #{recordCountPerPage} OFFSET #{firstIndex}
mapper.sql: FROM STN_ORDER_DLVY A JOIN STN_ORDER B ON A.ORDER_NO = B.ORDER_NO JOIN STN_ORDER_SETLE C ON A.ORDER_SETLE_NO = C.ORDER_SETLE_NO JOIN STN_GOODS D ON B.GOODS_ID = D.GOODS_ID LEFT JOIN ( SELECT * FROM DTC_CMMN_DETAIL_CODE WHERE CODE_ID='CMS022' ) CODE1 ON CODE1.CODE = A.DLVY_STTUS_CODE LEFT JOIN ( SELECT * FROM DTC_CMMN_DETAIL_CODE WHERE CODE_ID='CMS023' ) CODE2 ON CODE2.CODE = B.SBSCRPT_DLVY_WD LEFT JOIN ( SELECT * FROM DTC_CMMN_DETAIL_CODE WHERE CODE_ID='CMS009' ) CODE3 ON CODE3.CODE = B.ORDER_KND_CODE LEFT JOIN ( SELECT * FROM DTC_CMMN_DETAIL_CODE WHERE CODE_ID='CMS027' ) CODE4 ON CODE4.CODE = A.REQ_TY_CODE LEFT JOIN ( SELECT * FROM DTC_CMMN_DETAIL_CODE WHERE CODE_ID='CMS021' ) CODE5 ON CODE5.CODE = B.ORDER_STTUS_CODE

SELECT A.ORDER_ODR , CASE WHEN B.SBSCRPT_CYCLE_SE_CODE = 'WEEK' THEN CONCAT(B.SBSCRPT_WEEK_CYCLE, '주') WHEN B.SBSCRPT_CYCLE_SE_CODE = 'MONTH' THEN CONCAT(B.SBSCRPT_MT_CYCLE, '개월') END AS SBSCRPT_CYCLE , CASE WHEN B.SBSCRPT_CYCLE_SE_CODE = 'WEEK' THEN CONCAT(CODE1.CODE_NM, '요일') WHEN B.SBSCRPT_CYCLE_SE_CODE = 'MONTH' THEN CONCAT(B.SBSCRPT_DLVY_DAY, '일') END AS SBSCRPT_DLVY_DAY , C.GOODS_NM , A.ORDER_CO , A.DLVY_ADRES , A.ORDER_INFO , D.SETLE_STTUS_CODE , A.SETLE_AMOUNT , CASE WHEN D.SETLE_STTUS_CODE = 'R' THEN DATE_FORMAT(D.SETLE_PRARNDE, '%Y-%m-%d') ELSE D.SETLE_PNTTM END AS SETLE_PNTTM
LIMIT #{recordCountPerPage} OFFSET #{firstIndex}
mapper.sql: FROM STN_ORDER_DLVY A JOIN STN_ORDER B ON A.ORDER_NO = B.ORDER_NO JOIN STN_GOODS C ON B.GOODS_ID = C.GOODS_ID JOIN STN_ORDER_SETLE D ON A.ORDER_SETLE_NO = D.ORDER_SETLE_NO LEFT JOIN DTC_CMMN_DETAIL_CODE CODE1 ON B.SBSCRPT_DLVY_WD = CODE1.CODE AND CODE1.CODE_ID='CMS023'
WHERE A.ORDER_NO = #{orderNo} AND A.ORDER_REQ_STTUS_CODE NOT IN ('W', 'C', 'T')

SELECT a.ORDER_DLVY_NO ,a.ORDER_NO ,a.ORDER_SETLE_NO ,a.ORDER_KND_CODE ,a.SBSCRPT_CYCLE_SE_CODE ,a.SBSCRPT_WEEK_CYCLE ,a.SBSCRPT_DLVY_WD ,cw.CODE_NM AS SBSCRPT_DLVY_WD_NM ,a.SBSCRPT_MT_CYCLE ,a.SBSCRPT_DLVY_DAY ,b.ORDRR_ID ,b.ORDER_GROUP_NO ,b.ORDRR_NM ,b.ORDER_STTUS_CODE ,a.ORDER_CO ,a.SLE_AMOUNT ,a.DLVY_AMOUNT ,a.DLVY_USER_NM ,a.TELNO ,a.DLVY_ZIP ,a.DLVY_ADRES ,a.DLVY_ADRES_DETAIL ,a.DLVY_MSSAGE ,a.DLVY_STTUS_CODE ,cd.CODE_NM AS DLVY_STTUS_CODE_NM ,a.HDRY_ID ,a.HDRY_DLVY_DE ,a.INVC_NO ,a.ORDER_REQ_STTUS_CODE ,a.REQ_TY_CODE ,ce.CODE_NM AS REQ_TY_CODE_NM ,a.REGIST_PNTTM ,b.ORDER_PNTTM ,b.LAST_UPDT_PNTTM ,a.LAST_UPDUSR_ID ,a.ORDER_ODR ,a.CANCEL_PNTTM ,IFNULL(a.CANCEL_AMOUNT, 0) AS CANCEL_AMOUNT , CASE SETLE_STTUS_CODE WHEN 'R' THEN DATE_FORMAT(STR_TO_DATE(s.SETLE_PRARNDE, '%Y%m%d'),'%Y-%m-%d') ELSE s.SETLE_PNTTM END AS SETLE_PNTTM ,s.SETLE_STTUS_CODE ,s.SETLE_TOT_AMOUNT ,s.SETLE_RESULT_MSSAGE ,cs.CODE_NM AS SETLE_STTUS_CODE_NM ,g.GOODS_ID ,g.GOODS_NM ,g.GOODS_PC ,g.MODEL_NM ,g.GOODS_KND_CODE ,c.CMPNY_NM ,CONCAT( IF(ISNULL(sgc3.GOODS_CTGRY_NM) or sgc3.GOODS_CTGRY_NM = 'ROOT','',sgc3.GOODS_CTGRY_NM), IF(ISNULL(sgc3.GOODS_CTGRY_NM) or sgc3.GOODS_CTGRY_NM = 'ROOT','','>') ,IF(ISNULL(sgc2.GOODS_CTGRY_NM) or sgc2.GOODS_CTGRY_NM = 'ROOT','',sgc2.GOODS_CTGRY_NM),IF(ISNULL(sgc2.GOODS_CTGRY_NM) or sgc2.GOODS_CTGRY_NM = 'ROOT','','>') ,IF(ISNULL(sgc.GOODS_CTGRY_NM) or sgc.GOODS_CTGRY_NM = 'ROOT','',sgc.GOODS_CTGRY_NM) ) AS GOODS_CTGRY_NM ,co.CODE_NM AS ORDER_STTUS_CODE_NM , e.API_ID , m.PRTNR_ID , p.PRTNR_NM , f.MBER_NM AS CANCEL_USR_ID
ORDER BY
a.CANCEL_PNTTM DESC,
s.FAIL_PNTTM DESC,
b.LAST_UPDT_PNTTM DESC LIMIT #{recordCountPerPage} OFFSET #{firstIndex}

FROM STN_ORDER_DLVY a JOIN STN_ORDER b ON b.ORDER_NO = a.ORDER_NO AND b.USE_AT = 'Y' JOIN STN_ORDER_SETLE s ON s.ORDER_SETLE_NO = a.ORDER_SETLE_NO JOIN STN_GOODS g ON g.GOODS_ID = b.GOODS_ID JOIN STN_PRTNR_CMPNY_MAPNG m ON m.PCMAPNG_ID = g.PCMAPNG_ID JOIN STN_PRTNR p ON m.PRTNR_ID = p.PRTNR_ID JOIN STN_CMPNY c ON c.CMPNY_ID = m.CMPNY_ID AND c.USE_AT = 'Y' LEFT JOIN STN_HDRY_CMPNY e ON g.HDRY_ID = e.HDRY_ID AND e.USE_AT = 'Y' LEFT JOIN DTN_MBER f ON a.CANCEL_USR_ID = f.ESNTL_ID LEFT JOIN STN_GOODS_CTGRY sgc ON sgc.GOODS_CTGRY_ID = g.GOODS_CTGRY_ID AND sgc.USE_AT = 'Y' LEFT JOIN STN_GOODS_CTGRY sgc2 ON sgc2.GOODS_CTGRY_ID = sgc.UPPER_GOODS_CTGRY_ID AND sgc2.USE_AT = 'Y' LEFT JOIN STN_GOODS_CTGRY sgc3 ON sgc3.GOODS_CTGRY_ID = sgc2.UPPER_GOODS_CTGRY_ID AND sgc3.USE_AT = 'Y' LEFT JOIN ( SELECT CODE, CODE_NM FROM DTC_CMMN_DETAIL_CODE WHERE CODE_ID = 'CMS023' ) cw ON cw.CODE = a.SBSCRPT_DLVY_WD LEFT JOIN ( SELECT CODE, CODE_NM FROM DTC_CMMN_DETAIL_CODE WHERE CODE_ID = 'CMS026' ) cs ON cs.CODE = s.SETLE_STTUS_CODE LEFT JOIN ( SELECT CODE, CODE_NM FROM DTC_CMMN_DETAIL_CODE WHERE CODE_ID = 'CMS021' ) co ON co.CODE = b.ORDER_STTUS_CODE LEFT JOIN ( SELECT CODE, CODE_NM FROM DTC_CMMN_DETAIL_CODE WHERE CODE_ID = 'CMS022' ) cd ON cd.CODE = a.DLVY_STTUS_CODE LEFT JOIN ( SELECT CODE, CODE_NM FROM DTC_CMMN_DETAIL_CODE WHERE CODE_ID = 'CMS027' ) ce ON ce.CODE = a.REQ_TY_CODE
LEFT JOIN ( SELECT MAX(ORDER_DLVY_NO) AS ORDER_DLVY_NO FROM STN_ORDER_DLVY GROUP BY ORDER_NO ) stat ON a.ORDER_DLVY_NO = stat.ORDER_DLVY_NO

WHERE 1=1
AND s.SETLE_STTUS_CODE = 'S'
AND s.SETLE_STTUS_CODE = 'F'
AND a.REQ_TY_CODE IN ('C01', 'C02', 'C04')
AND a.REQ_TY_CODE IN ('E01', 'E02', 'E04', 'E05')
AND a.REQ_TY_CODE IN ('R01', 'R02', 'R04', 'R05')
AND b.ORDER_STTUS_CODE IN ('ST01', 'ST04', 'ST99') AND b.ORDER_KND_CODE = 'SBS'
AND c.CMPNY_ID = #{searchCmpnyId}
AND b.ORDER_NO LIKE CONCAT( '%' , #{searchOrderNo} , '%' )
AND b.ORDRR_NM LIKE CONCAT( '%' , #{searchOrdrrNm} , '%' )
AND g.GOODS_NM LIKE CONCAT( '%' , #{searchGoodsNm} , '%' )
AND g.GOODS_ID LIKE CONCAT( '%' , #{searchGoodsId} , '%' )
AND a.REQ_TY_CODE = #{searchReqTyCode}
GROUP BY b.ORDER_NO

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT a.ORDER_DLVY_NO ,a.ORDER_NO ,a.ORDER_SETLE_NO ,a.ORDER_KND_CODE ,a.SBSCRPT_CYCLE_SE_CODE ,a.SBSCRPT_WEEK_CYCLE ,a.SBSCRPT_DLVY_WD ,cw.CODE_NM AS SBSCRPT_DLVY_WD_NM ,a.SBSCRPT_MT_CYCLE ,a.SBSCRPT_DLVY_DAY ,b.ORDRR_ID ,b.ORDER_GROUP_NO ,b.ORDRR_NM ,b.ORDER_STTUS_CODE ,a.ORDER_ODR ,a.ORDER_CO ,a.SLE_AMOUNT ,a.DLVY_AMOUNT ,a.DLVY_USER_NM ,a.TELNO ,a.DLVY_ZIP ,a.DLVY_ADRES ,a.DLVY_ADRES_DETAIL ,a.DLVY_MSSAGE ,a.DLVY_STTUS_CODE ,cd.CODE_NM AS DLVY_STTUS_CODE_NM ,a.HDRY_ID ,a.HDRY_DLVY_DE ,a.INVC_NO ,a.ORDER_REQ_STTUS_CODE ,a.REQ_TY_CODE ,ce.CODE_NM AS REQ_TY_CODE_NM ,a.REGIST_PNTTM ,b.ORDER_PNTTM ,a.LAST_UPDT_PNTTM ,a.LAST_UPDUSR_ID , CASE SETLE_STTUS_CODE WHEN 'R' THEN DATE_FORMAT(STR_TO_DATE(s.SETLE_PRARNDE, '%Y%m%d'),'%Y-%m-%d') ELSE s.SETLE_PNTTM END AS SETLE_PNTTM ,s.SETLE_STTUS_CODE ,s.SETLE_TOT_AMOUNT ,cs.CODE_NM AS SETLE_STTUS_CODE_NM ,g.GOODS_ID ,g.GOODS_NM ,g.GOODS_PC ,g.MODEL_NM ,g.GOODS_KND_CODE ,c.CMPNY_NM ,CONCAT( IF(ISNULL(sgc3.GOODS_CTGRY_NM) or sgc3.GOODS_CTGRY_NM = 'ROOT','',sgc3.GOODS_CTGRY_NM), IF(ISNULL(sgc3.GOODS_CTGRY_NM) or sgc3.GOODS_CTGRY_NM = 'ROOT','','>') ,IF(ISNULL(sgc2.GOODS_CTGRY_NM) or sgc2.GOODS_CTGRY_NM = 'ROOT','',sgc2.GOODS_CTGRY_NM),IF(ISNULL(sgc2.GOODS_CTGRY_NM) or sgc2.GOODS_CTGRY_NM = 'ROOT','','>') ,IF(ISNULL(sgc.GOODS_CTGRY_NM) or sgc.GOODS_CTGRY_NM = 'ROOT','',sgc.GOODS_CTGRY_NM) ) AS GOODS_CTGRY_NM ,co.CODE_NM AS ORDER_STTUS_CODE_NM , e.API_ID
) X
WHERE X.REQ_TY_CODE IN ('C01', 'T01')
WHERE X.REQ_TY_CODE IN ('C04', 'T02')

SELECT a.ORDER_DLVY_NO ,a.ORDER_NO ,a.ORDER_SETLE_NO ,a.ORDER_KND_CODE ,a.SBSCRPT_CYCLE_SE_CODE ,a.SBSCRPT_WEEK_CYCLE ,a.SBSCRPT_DLVY_WD ,cw.CODE_NM AS SBSCRPT_DLVY_WD_NM ,a.SBSCRPT_MT_CYCLE ,a.SBSCRPT_DLVY_DAY ,b.ORDRR_ID ,b.ORDER_GROUP_NO ,b.ORDRR_NM ,b.ORDER_STTUS_CODE ,a.ORDER_ODR ,a.ORDER_CO ,a.SLE_AMOUNT ,a.DLVY_AMOUNT ,a.DLVY_USER_NM ,a.TELNO ,a.DLVY_ZIP ,a.DLVY_ADRES ,a.DLVY_ADRES_DETAIL ,a.DLVY_MSSAGE ,a.DLVY_STTUS_CODE ,cd.CODE_NM AS DLVY_STTUS_CODE_NM ,a.HDRY_ID ,a.HDRY_DLVY_DE ,a.INVC_NO ,a.ORDER_REQ_STTUS_CODE ,a.REQ_TY_CODE ,ce.CODE_NM AS REQ_TY_CODE_NM ,a.REGIST_PNTTM ,b.ORDER_PNTTM ,b.GOODS_AMOUNT ,a.LAST_UPDT_PNTTM ,a.LAST_UPDUSR_ID ,a.ORDER_ODR , CASE SETLE_STTUS_CODE WHEN 'R' THEN DATE_FORMAT(STR_TO_DATE(s.SETLE_PRARNDE, '%Y%m%d'),'%Y-%m-%d') ELSE s.SETLE_PNTTM END AS SETLE_PNTTM ,s.SETLE_STTUS_CODE ,s.SETLE_TOT_AMOUNT ,s.SETLE_RESULT_MSSAGE ,cs.CODE_NM AS SETLE_STTUS_CODE_NM ,g.GOODS_ID ,g.GOODS_NM ,g.GOODS_PC ,g.MODEL_NM ,g.GOODS_KND_CODE ,c.CMPNY_NM ,CONCAT( IF(ISNULL(sgc3.GOODS_CTGRY_NM) or sgc3.GOODS_CTGRY_NM = 'ROOT','',sgc3.GOODS_CTGRY_NM), IF(ISNULL(sgc3.GOODS_CTGRY_NM) or sgc3.GOODS_CTGRY_NM = 'ROOT','','>') ,IF(ISNULL(sgc2.GOODS_CTGRY_NM) or sgc2.GOODS_CTGRY_NM = 'ROOT','',sgc2.GOODS_CTGRY_NM),IF(ISNULL(sgc2.GOODS_CTGRY_NM) or sgc2.GOODS_CTGRY_NM = 'ROOT','','>') ,IF(ISNULL(sgc.GOODS_CTGRY_NM) or sgc.GOODS_CTGRY_NM = 'ROOT','',sgc.GOODS_CTGRY_NM) ) AS GOODS_CTGRY_NM ,co.CODE_NM AS ORDER_STTUS_CODE_NM , e.API_ID , a.ORDER_INFO , IFNULL(s.SETLE_POINT, 0) AS SETLE_POINT , IFNULL(s.SETLE_CARD_AMOUNT, 0) AS SETLE_CARD_AMOUNT
ORDER BY a.ORDER_DLVY_NO DESC
mapper.sql: FROM STN_ORDER_DLVY a JOIN STN_ORDER b ON b.ORDER_NO = a.ORDER_NO AND b.USE_AT = 'Y' JOIN STN_ORDER_SETLE s ON s.ORDER_SETLE_NO = a.ORDER_SETLE_NO JOIN STN_GOODS g ON g.GOODS_ID = b.GOODS_ID JOIN STN_PRTNR_CMPNY_MAPNG m ON m.PCMAPNG_ID = g.PCMAPNG_ID JOIN STN_CMPNY c ON c.CMPNY_ID = m.CMPNY_ID AND c.USE_AT = 'Y' LEFT JOIN STN_HDRY_CMPNY e ON a.HDRY_ID = e.HDRY_ID AND e.USE_AT = 'Y' LEFT JOIN STN_GOODS_CTGRY sgc ON sgc.GOODS_CTGRY_ID = g.GOODS_CTGRY_ID AND sgc.USE_AT = 'Y' LEFT JOIN STN_GOODS_CTGRY sgc2 ON sgc2.GOODS_CTGRY_ID = sgc.UPPER_GOODS_CTGRY_ID AND sgc2.USE_AT = 'Y' LEFT JOIN STN_GOODS_CTGRY sgc3 ON sgc3.GOODS_CTGRY_ID = sgc2.UPPER_GOODS_CTGRY_ID AND sgc3.USE_AT = 'Y' LEFT JOIN ( SELECT CODE, CODE_NM FROM DTC_CMMN_DETAIL_CODE WHERE CODE_ID = 'CMS023' ) cw ON cw.CODE = a.SBSCRPT_DLVY_WD LEFT JOIN ( SELECT CODE, CODE_NM FROM DTC_CMMN_DETAIL_CODE WHERE CODE_ID = 'CMS026' ) cs ON cs.CODE = s.SETLE_STTUS_CODE LEFT JOIN ( SELECT CODE, CODE_NM FROM DTC_CMMN_DETAIL_CODE WHERE CODE_ID = 'CMS021' ) co ON co.CODE = b.ORDER_STTUS_CODE LEFT JOIN ( SELECT CODE, CODE_NM FROM DTC_CMMN_DETAIL_CODE WHERE CODE_ID = 'CMS022' ) cd ON cd.CODE = a.DLVY_STTUS_CODE LEFT JOIN ( SELECT CODE, CODE_NM FROM DTC_CMMN_DETAIL_CODE WHERE CODE_ID = 'CMS027' ) ce ON ce.CODE = a.REQ_TY_CODE
mapper.update: UPDATE STN_ORDER_DLVY SET REQ_TY_CODE=#{reqTyCode} , ORDER_REQ_STTUS_CODE=#{orderReqSttusCode} WHERE ORDER_SETLE_NO = (SELECT MAX(B.ORDER_SETLE_NO) FROM STN_ORDER A JOIN STN_ORDER_DLVY B ON A.ORDER_NO = B.ORDER_NO WHERE A.ORDER_NO=#{orderNo})
mapper.select: SELECT IFNULL(COUNT(*),0) AS CNT , IFNULL(SUM(s.SETLE_TOT_AMOUNT),0) AS SETLE_TOT_AMOUNT FROM STN_ORDER_DLVY a JOIN STN_ORDER b ON b.ORDER_NO = a.ORDER_NO AND b.USE_AT = 'Y' JOIN STN_ORDER_SETLE s ON s.ORDER_SETLE_NO = a.ORDER_SETLE_NO JOIN STN_GOODS g ON g.GOODS_ID = b.GOODS_ID AND g.USE_AT = 'Y' JOIN STN_PRTNR_CMPNY_MAPNG m ON m.PCMAPNG_ID = g.PCMAPNG_ID JOIN STN_PRTNR p ON p.PRTNR_ID = m.PRTNR_ID JOIN STN_CMPNY c ON c.CMPNY_ID = m.CMPNY_ID AND c.USE_AT = 'Y' LEFT JOIN STN_HDRY_CMPNY e ON a.HDRY_ID = e.HDRY_ID AND e.USE_AT = 'Y' LEFT JOIN STN_GOODS_CTGRY sgc ON sgc.GOODS_CTGRY_ID = g.GOODS_CTGRY_ID AND sgc.USE_AT = 'Y' LEFT JOIN STN_GOODS_CTGRY sgc2 ON sgc2.GOODS_CTGRY_ID = sgc.UPPER_GOODS_CTGRY_ID AND sgc2.USE_AT = 'Y' LEFT JOIN STN_GOODS_CTGRY sgc3 ON sgc3.GOODS_CTGRY_ID = sgc2.UPPER_GOODS_CTGRY_ID AND sgc3.USE_AT = 'Y' LEFT JOIN DTC_CMMN_DETAIL_CODE cw ON cw.CODE = a.SBSCRPT_DLVY_WD AND cw.CODE_ID = 'CMS023' LEFT JOIN DTC_CMMN_DETAIL_CODE cs ON cs.CODE = s.SETLE_STTUS_CODE AND cs.CODE_ID = 'CMS026' LEFT JOIN DTC_CMMN_DETAIL_CODE co ON co.CODE = b.ORDER_STTUS_CODE AND co.CODE_ID = 'CMS021' LEFT JOIN DTC_CMMN_DETAIL_CODE cd ON cd.CODE = a.DLVY_STTUS_CODE AND cd.CODE_ID = 'CMS022' LEFT JOIN DTC_CMMN_DETAIL_CODE ce ON ce.CODE = a.REQ_TY_CODE AND ce.CODE_ID = 'CMS027'

SELECT A.ORDER_DLVY_NO , A.ORDER_NO , A.ORDER_SETLE_NO , A.ORDER_KND_CODE , A.SBSCRPT_CYCLE_SE_CODE , A.SBSCRPT_WEEK_CYCLE , A.SBSCRPT_DLVY_WD , A.SBSCRPT_MT_CYCLE , A.SBSCRPT_DLVY_DAY , A.ORDER_ODR , A.ORDER_CO , A.SLE_AMOUNT , A.DSCNT_AMOUNT , A.GOODS_AMOUNT , A.OPTN_AMOUNT , A.SETLE_AMOUNT , A.DLVY_AMOUNT , A.DLVY_USER_NM , A.TELNO , A.DLVY_ZIP , A.DLVY_ADRES , A.DLVY_ADRES_DETAIL , A.DLVY_MSSAGE , A.DLVY_STTUS_CODE , A.HDRY_ID , A.HDRY_DLVY_DE , A.INVC_NO , A.ORDER_INFO , A.ORDER_REQ_STTUS_CODE , A.DLVY_PRARNDE , A.REQ_TY_CODE , A.REGIST_PNTTM , A.LAST_UPDT_PNTTM , A.LAST_UPDUSR_ID , A.CANCEL_PNTTM , A.CANCEL_AMOUNT FROM STN_ORDER_DLVY A WHERE A.ORDER_DLVY_NO = #{orderDlvyNo}
